shows.title: Nancy Guthrie Case / Spirits & Ouija Board
shows.first_half: True crime podcaster Joel Waldman discussed the baffling abduction of 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie. Followed by metaphysical researcher Karen A. Dahlman on spirit communication, consciousness, and the Ouija board.

shows.title: Heightened Human Senses / UFO Crash Update
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, tech founder, and photographer Maureen Seaberg will discuss how the human sensory system is far stronger than anyone realizes. She'll also explain how this system is very specific to Earth and doesn't work well off-world. Seaberg will specifically detail the way our senses interact within our body and how they dictate the way we think, feel, and react to different situations.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Writer and archaeologist Mark Olly will outline the recent analysis of UFO crash debris found scattered across four fields outside a sleepy Welsh village in January 1983.

shows.title: Preventing Spiritual Attacks / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Bill Bean, known as the Spiritual Warrior, will share his personal story and talk about his career as an exorcist and minister. He'll explain the 15 warning signs of a possible spiritual attack and will pass along information on how to prevent it from happening. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half—give George a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
